title: 1 Bed Flat, Highbury New Park, N5

Image of house with a better description

description:
We have an opportunity for a luxury flat in central London with bright spacious rooms and direct access to a private section of a tresured shared garden. The flat is in a beautifully renovated early victorian building. 
<\/p>

The building benefits from on-site private management which ensures constant care, upkeep, and assistance as necessary. Tenants value the neighbourly feel the whole building has.<\/p>

The Space<\/b><\/p>

We are offering a spacious (800 Sq Ft\/74 Sq M) 1 bedroom flat  that inside offers a living room, a separate kitchen, a bathroom and a storage room, and outside a private patio. The flat is fully furnished as is but we can be flexible.<\/p>

The kitchen is fully equipped with a built in dishwasher, microwave, nespresso machine, washing machine, electric hob, and oven.
<\/p>


<\/p>

The light filled bedroom is able to accomodate a superking bed and a large wardrobe with plenty of space to spare.<\/p>

Beyond your secluded private patio, is a vast, and secure communal garden shared with the other tenants of the building equipped with a BBQ and a fire pit. The <\/b>garden is a rare haven in London, well kept, loved and completely isolated from the street. <\/p>

The flat is wired for Virgin high speed internet and television.
<\/p>

Residents permit parking on road.<\/p>

Landlords and management are open to furnishing if requested.

Location and Transport Access <\/b><\/p>

The <\/b>flat is ideally situated and in walking distance from quality Upper Street shops, local pubs, and restaurants. <\/b><\/p>

3 minutes walk from local Sainsburys. 7 minutes from waitrose and teso
<\/p>

8 minutes walk from Highbury and Islington tube station (Victoria Line) which makes Kings Cross only 25 minutes door-to-door.<\/p>

5 minutes from Canonbury overground station.<\/p>
